title: Dr. Jill Biden to deliver commencement address at Kingsborough Community College in New York | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 08, 2009

 



Dr. Jill Biden to deliver commencement address at Kingsborough Community College in New York




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  __________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                     June 8, 2009    DR. JILL BIDEN TO DELIVER COMMENCEMENT ADDRESS AT KINGSBOROUGH COMMUNITY COLLEGE IN NEW YORK  On Friday June 12, Dr. Jill Biden will give the commencement address to graduates of Kingsborough Community College. Dr. Biden, an educator of 28 years, has taught English in community colleges for the past 16 years and continues to teach English courses at a community college in Northern Virginia. Kingsborough Community College of the City University of New York is Brooklyn’s only community college and serves approximately 30,000 students per year. This morning event is open press, members of the media should please contact Ruby Ryles at Ruby.Ryles@kbcc.cuny.edu or 718.368.5543.
